00029 ScalarField::ScalarField( void ){
00030   std::cout << " in ScalarField()..." << std::endl;
00031   //phi_ = Array3( 512,512,512);
00032   dx_ = 0.0f;
00033   nx_ = 0;
00034   ny_ = 0;
00035   nz_ = 0;
00036   nstencil_ = 0;
00037 }
00038 
00039 ScalarField::ScalarField( unsigned nx, unsigned ny, unsigned nz, 
00040               float dx, int nstencil ){
00041   std::cout << " in ScalarField(" << nx << "," << ny << "," << nz;
00042   std::cout << "," << dx << "," << nstencil << ")..."<< std::endl;
00043   //phi_ = Array3( nx, ny, nz );   //dy_( local_nx, ny, nz ),
00044   phi_ = new float(nx*ny*nz);
00045   dx_ = dx;
00046   nx_ = nx;
00047   ny_ = ny;
00048   nz_ = nz;
00049 
00050   nstencil_ = nstencil;
00051   nsten2_ = ( nstencil_ - 1 ) / 2;
00052 }
00053 
00054 ScalarField::~ScalarField(){
00055   delete[] phi_;
00056 }
00057 
00058 float
00059 ScalarField::operator() ( int ix, int iy, int iz ) {
00060   return phi_[(ix*ny_+iy) +iz];
00061 }
00062 
00063 void
00064 ScalarField::setValue(int ix, int iy, int iz, float val){
00065   phi_[(ix*ny_+iy)+iz]=val;
00066 }

00105 void 
00106 ScalarField::lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, 
00107              std::vector< float >& values ) {
00108   values.clear();
00109   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00110     values.push_back( ( *this ) ( Coord[ 3 * i ], 
00111                   Coord[ 3 * i + 1 ], 
00112                   Coord[ 3 * i + 2 ] ) );
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void
00117 ScalarField::lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, float ll, unsigned N, 
00118              std::vector< float >& values ) {
00119   values.clear();
00120   float factor = 1.0; //(float)N/ll;
00121   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00122     values.push_back( ( *this ) ( Coord[ 3 * i ] * factor, 
00123                   Coord[ 3 * i + 1 ] * factor, 
00124                   Coord[ 3 * i + 2 ] * factor ) );
00125   }
00126 }

00128 
00129 float 
00130 ScalarField::get_CIC( float coordx, float coordy, float coordz ) {
00131   
00132   int
00133     ix = ( int ) coordx,
00134     iy = ( int ) coordy,
00135     iz = ( int ) coordz,
00136     ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_,
00137     iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_,
00138     iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00139   
00140   
00141   float
00142     dx = ( float ) ( coordx - ( float ) ix ),
00143     dy = ( float ) ( coordy - ( float ) iy ),
00144     dz = ( float ) ( coordz - ( float ) iz ),
00145     tx = 1.0 - dx,
00146     ty = 1.0 - dy,
00147     tz = 1.0 - dz;
00148 
00149   float
00150     f_xyz = ( *this ) ( ix, iy, iz ) * tx * ty * tz,
00151     f_Xyz = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy, iz ) * dx * ty * tz,
00152     f_xYz = ( *this ) ( ix, iy1, iz ) * tx * dy * tz,
00153     f_xyZ = ( *this ) ( ix, iy, iz1 ) * tx * ty * dz,
00154     f_XYz = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy1, iz ) * dx * dy * tz,
00155     f_XyZ = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy, iz1 ) * dx * ty * dz,
00156     f_xYZ = ( *this ) ( ix, iy1, iz1 ) * tx * dy * dz,
00157     f_XYZ = ( *this ) ( ix1, iy1, iz1 ) * dx * dy * dz;
00158   
00159   return f_xyz + f_Xyz + f_xYz + f_xyZ + f_XYz + f_XyZ + f_xYZ + f_XYZ;
00160 }
00161 
00162 float
00163 ScalarField::diff1( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i ) {
00164   int iright[ 3 ];
00165   for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k ){
00166     iright[ k ] = 0;
00167   }
00168   iright[ i ] = + 1;
00169   
00170   float d1i = 0.0;
00171   
00172   for ( int ii = -nsten2_; ii <= nsten2_; ++ii ) {
00173     int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00174     int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00175     int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00176     d1i += pStencil1_[ ii + nsten2_ ] * ( *this ) ( iix, iiy, iiz );
00177     }
00178   
00179   return d1i;
00180 }

00182 
00183 float
00184 ScalarField::diff2( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i, int j ) {
00185   // trace component of the Hessian?
00186   if ( i == j ) {
00187     
00188     int iright[ 3 ];
00189     
00190     for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00191       iright[ k ] = 0;
00192     iright[ i ] = + 1;
00193     
00194     float d2ii = 0.0;
00195     
00196     for ( int ii = -nsten2_; ii <= nsten2_; ++ii ) {
00197       int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00198       int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00199       int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00200       d2ii += pStencil2_[ ii + nsten2_ ] * ( *this ) ( iix, iiy, iiz );
00201     }
00202     return d2ii;
00203   }
00204   
00205   // off-trace component of the Hessian
00206   int jright[ 3 ];
00207   
00208   for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00209     jright[ k ] = 0;
00210   jright[ j ] = + 1;
00211   
00212   float d1j = 0;
00213   
00214   for ( int ii = -nsten2_; ii <= nsten2_; ++ii ) {
00215     int iix = ( ix + ii * jright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00216     int iiy = ( iy + ii * jright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00217     int iiz = ( iz + ii * jright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00218     d1j += pStencil1_[ ii + nsten2_ ] 
00219       * this->diff1( iix, iiy, iiz, i );
00220   }
00221   
00222   return d1j;
00223 }

00225 void
00226 ScalarField::test(){
00227   std::cout << " in ScalarField::test()..." << std::endl;
00228   unsigned ix,iy,iz;
00229   for(ix=0; ix<nx_; ++ix){
00230     for(iy=0; iy<ny_; ++iy){
00231       for(iz=0; iz<nz_; ++iz){
00232     this->setValue( ix,iy,iz,-1.0f);
00233       }
00234     }
00235   }
00236 }

00244 void 
00245 ScalarField::put_CIC( unsigned npart, float *coord, float *wpar ) {
00246 
00247   unsigned ix, iy, iz, ix1, iy1, iz1;
00248   float x, y, z;
00249   float dx, dy, dz, dyw;
00250   float tx, ty, tz, tyw;
00251 
00252   static bool bInitialized( false );
00253 
00254   if ( !bInitialized ) {
00255     bInitialized = true;
00256     std::cout << " * * initializing density field with -1...";
00257     for ( ix = 0; ix < nx_; ++ix ){
00258       for ( iy = 0; iy < ny_; ++iy ){
00259     for ( iz = 0; iz < nz_; ++iz ){
00260       this->setValue( ix, iy, iz, -1.0f);
00261     }
00262       }
00263     }
00264     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00265   }
00266 
00267   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart; ++i ) {
00268     x = coord[ 3*i+0 ];
00269     y = coord[ 3*i+1 ];
00270     z = coord[ 3*i+2 ];
00271 
00272     ix = unsigned ( x );
00273     iy = unsigned ( y );
00274     iz = unsigned ( z );
00275 
00276     dx = x - ( float ( ix ) );
00277     dy = y - ( float ( iy ) );
00278     dz = z - ( float ( iz ) );
00279 
00280     ix %= nx_;
00281     iy %= ny_;
00282     iz %= nz_;
00283 
00284     tx = 1.0 - dx;
00285     ty = 1.0 - dy;
00286     tz = 1.0 - dz;
00287 
00288     tyw = ty * wpar[ i ];
00289     dyw = dy * wpar[ i ];
00290 
00291     ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_;
00292     iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_;
00293     iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00294 
00295     //TODO
00296     //phi_.addValue( ix, iy, iz, tz * tx * tyw);
00297     //phi_.addValue( ix, iy1, iz, tz * tx * dyw);
00298     //phi_.addValue( ix, iy, iz1, dz * tx * tyw);
00299     //phi_.addValue( ix, iy1, iz1, dz * tx * dyw);
00300 
00301     //phi_.addValue( ix1, iy, iz, tz * dx * tyw);
00302     //phi_.addValue( ix1, iy1, iz, tz * dx * dyw);
00303     //phi_.addValue( ix1, iy, iz1, dz * dx * tyw);
00304     //phi_.addValue( ix1, iy1, iz1, dz * dx * dyw);
00305 
00306   }
00307 }

00309 
00317 void
00318 ScalarField::diff2atCIC( float *Coord, unsigned nPoints,
00319              std::vector< Matrix33 > &t_ij ) {
00320 
00321   ChooseStencil();
00322 
00323   for ( unsigned ip = 0; ip < nPoints; ++ip ) {
00324     int ix = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 0 ] );
00325     int iy = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 1 ] );
00326     int iz = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 2 ] );
00327 
00328     if ( ix > int ( nx_ ) ) {
00329       std::cerr << " * * ERROR: index out of bounds! ";
00330       std::cerr << Coord[ 3 * ip ] << std::endl;
00331       ix = nx_;
00332     }
00333 
00334     int
00335       ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_,
00336       iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_,
00337       iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00338 
00339     float x = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 0 ] );
00340     float y = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 1 ] );
00341     float z = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 2 ] );
00342 
00343     float
00344       cic_dx = x - ( float ) ix;
00345     float cic_dy = y - ( float ) iy;
00346     float cic_dz = z - ( float ) iz;
00347     float cic_tx = 1.0 - cic_dx;
00348     float cic_ty = 1.0 - cic_dy;
00349     float cic_tz = 1.0 - cic_dz;
00350 
00351     float xyz = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00352     float Xyz = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00353     float xYz = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00354     float XYz = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00355     float xyZ = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00356     float XyZ = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00357     float xYZ = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00358     float XYZ = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00359 
00360     Matrix33 t;
00361 
00362     for ( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i ){
00363       for ( int j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00364 
00365     float
00366       f_ijk, f_Ijk, f_iJk, f_IJk,
00367       f_ijK, f_IjK, f_iJK, f_IJK;
00368 
00369     float
00370       dy_ijk, dy_Ijk, dy_iJk, dy_IJk,
00371       dy_ijK, dy_IjK, dy_iJK, dy_IJK;
00372 
00373     f_ijk = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz, i, j );
00374     f_Ijk = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz, i, j );
00375     f_iJk = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz, i, j );
00376     f_IJk = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz, i, j );
00377     f_ijK = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz1, i, j );
00378     f_IjK = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz1, i, j );
00379     f_iJK = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00380     f_IJK = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00381 
00382     dy_ijk = f_ijk * xyz;
00383     dy_Ijk = f_Ijk * Xyz;
00384     dy_iJk = f_iJk * xYz;
00385     dy_IJk = f_IJk * XYz;
00386     dy_ijK = f_ijK * xyZ;
00387     dy_IjK = f_IjK * XyZ;
00388     dy_iJK = f_iJK * xYZ;
00389     dy_IJK = f_IJK * XYZ;
00390 
00391     t( i, j ) = dy_ijk + dy_Ijk + dy_iJk + dy_IJk + dy_ijK + dy_IjK + dy_iJK + dy_IJK;
00392       }
00393     }
00394     t_ij.push_back( t );
00395   }
00396 }

00399 
00405 void
00406 ScalarField::ChooseStencil( void ) {
00407   switch ( nstencil_ ) {
00408 
00409   case 3:
00410     pStencil1_ = stencil3_1;
00411     pStencil2_ = stencil3_2;
00412     break;
00413 
00414   case 5:
00415     pStencil1_ = stencil5_1;
00416     pStencil2_ = stencil5_2;
00417     break;
00418 
00419   case 7:
00420     pStencil1_ = stencil7_1;
00421     pStencil2_ = stencil7_2;
00422     break;
00423 
00424   case 9:
00425     pStencil1_ = stencil9_1;
00426     pStencil2_ = stencil9_2;
00427     break;
00428 
00429   case 11:
00430     pStencil1_ = stencil11_1;
00431     pStencil2_ = stencil11_2;
00432     break;
00433 
00434   default:
00435     std::cerr << " * * ERROR: unsupported finite difference scheme ";
00436     std::cerr << "in ScalarField::ChooseStencil!" << std::endl;
00437     abort();
00438   }
00439 }
